```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
data("instacart")

instacart = instacart |> 
  select(order_id, days_since_prior_order, user_id, order_number) |> 
  filter(order_id %in% 100:10000)
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
instacart |> 
  mutate(
    text_label = str_c("User id: ", user_id, 
                       "\nOrder Number: ", order_number,
                       "\nDays since prior order: ", days_since_prior_order)) |> 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~order_number, y = ~days_since_prior_order, color = ~as.factor(user_id), text = ~text_label,
    type = "scatter", mode = "markers", alpha = 0.5
  )
```
